title: Fallen University: Complete Series
description: COMPLETE REVERSE HAREM SERIESDid you know ordinary people can be turned into demons? I sure as f#ck didn’t. Until it happened to me.One day, I was a regular college student, working a boring job and studying for finals—and the next, I was transformed into some strange creature of the night.Now I’ve got powers I don’t understand, I can change my appearance with a thought, and I’m having all kinds of odd… cravings.If I thought all this bullshit was gonna get me out of going to college though, I’ve got another think coming. Nope, I still need an education. Except the classes at Fallen University are on things like “Curses and Hexcraft” and “Magical Combat”.It’s not all bad. There are these four hot as hell guys I keep bumping into—Kingston, Jayce, Xero, and Kai. I’m not sure if I should trust them; they’ve each got secrets of their own, and they’re definitely dangerous.But that craving I’ve been having?It’s pulling me right toward them.Yup, things are about to get real interesting at FU.The Fallen University series is a fast-burn reverse harem paranormal romance. It contains cursing, magic, and lots of steam.BOOKS IN THIS SET:Fallen University: Year OneFallen University: Year TwoFallen University: Year Three
author: Callie Rose
